caption.title: Best model subsets for current and future climate (GCMs projected to the year 2050) were combined by RCP emissions scenarios to illustrate the estimated contraction and expansion of larval Aedes aegypti geographic range in Ecuador.
caption.p: This figure was produced in ArcMap 10.4 (ESRI, Redlands, CA) using rasters of model output produced with DesktopGARP (ver. 1.1.3), and elevation data freely available from NASAâ€™s Shuttle Radar Topography Mission ( jpl.nasa.gov/srtm).
